snippet.title: Rooms of Realities - Launch Trailer [App Lab & Steam] | Early Access
snippet.description:
We've been waiting for you, Adventurers. It's time to head to the world of Rooms of Realities!

💡💡💡
Here's the Early Access Rooms of Realities launch trailer. It's a game that will continue to grow and will provide a lot of adventures and puzzles for fans of discovering secrets, searching for artifacts and having fun in Escape Rooms.
The first three chapters will take you to a scenario around discovering the secrets of the pyramids. The next six chapters will be added to the game in the form of free updates. They will take you to the underwater world and to a mysterious hospital. Be with us from the beginning of this journey and enjoy virtual escape rooms in solo mode or in coop with friends!

💡💡💡
Get Rooms of Realities on App Lab:
https://www.oculus.com/experiences/quest/9310428738998196/
Get Rooms of Realities on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1917810/Rooms_of_Realities/

💡💡💡
Follow our channels and announcements to stay up to date and see how Rooms of Realities is developing:

💬【𝙳𝙸𝚂𝙲𝙾𝚁𝙳】https://discord.gg/ZUQfuxgjru
📰【𝙵𝙰𝙲𝙴𝙱𝙾𝙾𝙺】 https://www.facebook.com/Gamedust 
🦆【𝚃𝚆𝙸𝚃𝚃𝙴𝚁】 https://twitter.com/GamedustTT 
📷【𝙸𝙽𝚂𝚃𝙰𝙶𝚁𝙰𝙼】https://www.instagram.com/gamedust_studio/ 

+You can always visit official website of the game: https://roomsofrealities.com/
